title: AVrelated service
extract: service noun (PUBLIC NEED) ​ B1 [ C ] a government system or private organization that is responsible for a particular type of activity, or for providing a particular thing that people need: the postal service.
extract_html: service noun (PUBLIC NEED) ​ B1 [ C ] a government system or private organization that is responsible for a particular type of activity, or for providing a particular thing that people need: the postal service.
